title: Yasuo High Noon Chroma Visual Bug
body:
First of all it's more of a visual bug rather than a bug, but it still has the word "bug" in it.

The thing was when I played Yasuo (High Noon Chroma Amethyst) when I e+q I noticed when the game detects you are doing an e+q, in mid-action the skin is going back to the normal High Noon skin (without chroma) but when the animation is about to end it goes back to what chroma you have. I dont know if it's for all chromas but I can surely say it's for the Amethyst one. {{champion:157}}

replies.body: Hi! His is certainly a bug - I know this is a known issue, but lemme follow up today and see where we're at with it, or at least bring it back on the radar. :)

Hi, about the bug. I think it's done because when I uploaded this post, I tried to see if the bug is still there, and apparently it's gone. Maybe it was something from my end.
Thanks for responding back!
Oh, weird! I can still follow up, just to be sure! :)
